name: Bruises are how sadists kiss 1053
description:
"Everyone's a masochist, but they don't show up to work with bruises"

Generative art worth purchasing has a human story behind it, just as much as it has a technical implementation. Art from this system is generated by sampling points from a C++ implementation of the fractal flame iterated function system, and rendering the corresponding Voronoi tessellation using R. The tessellation is hard to see, because the colour palette is used as concealer: applying the same colour to adjacent cells masks the boundaries that would otherwise reveal the truth. It's a skill every masochist aquires, and if you're going to date sadists you'd best be prepared.
